channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Windsurf: OpenAI’s potential $3B bet to drive the ‘vibe coding’ movement
item.description: A Windsurf deal would allow OpenAI to own more of the full-stack coding experience (and it would be its most expensive acquisition to date).

item.title: The world’s biggest space-based radar will measure Earth’s forests from orbit
item.description: Forests are the second-largest carbon sink on the planet, after the oceans. To understand exactly how much carbon they trap, the European Space Agency...

item.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
item.description: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income.”

item.title: Here’s why unemployment in software coding and programming is so high
item.description: Manpower’s stock has its worst day in 27 years as tariff uncertainty, acceleration in use of AI led to lower demand for permanent jobs.

item.title: Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash introduces ‘thinking budgets’ that cut AI costs by 600% when turned down
item.description: Google's new Gemini 2.5 Flash AI model introduces adjustable "thinking budgets" that let businesses pay only for the reasoning power they need, balanc...

item.title: Supermodel Linda Evangelista is selling her NYC ‘industrial-cool chic loft’ for $8.19 million
item.description: The penthouse comes with a massive 2,500-square-foot roof terrace that boasts stunning city views.

item.title: How creativity became the reigning value of our time

item.title: My late uncle’s house is in foreclosure. A woman claims to be his daughter and my cousin is a squatter. What can we do?
item.description: “She keeps threatening to remove this nephew from the home.”

item.title: My IRA had the biggest one-day gain ever. What will tomorrow bring?
item.description: “My personal trading account was also up 18% in one day.”

item.title: Longevity clinics around the world are selling unproven treatments

item.title: New method lets DeepSeek and other models answer ‘sensitive’ questions
item.description: Enterprise risk company CTGT said their method cuts bias and censorship in models like DeepSeek.

item.title: BigQuery is 5x bigger than Snowflake and Databricks: What Google is doing to make it even better
item.description: Google ramps up the competition in the enterprise data space claiming its AI innovation help it to leapfrog rivals.
